numbered_ace_sentences: 2. I noticed that money has some effect on the acceptance rate of elite colleges.
3. I think that the biggest effect on the acceptance rate is that a parent attended the same college.
4. A college is a legacy school for a person if a parent of the person attended the college.
5. I wonder why the graph is inconsistent.
6. I wonder whether the graph was intended to show that richer individuals get into elite colleges.
7. I hardly know any person who has gone to an elite college.
